item.title: Rep. Dusty Johnson's Bill Sets Up Panama Canal Acquisition
item.description: Rep. Dusty Johnson, R-S.D., plans to introduce a bill Thursday to authorize the president to purchase the Panama Canal and put it under U.S. control.
